mbrs_r_finger_speed.Description: Modified bradykinesia rating scale: Right finger tapping speed

Levels.01: Mild slowing
Levels.02: Moderate slowing
Levels.03: Severe slowing

mbrs_r_finger_amp.Description: Modified bradykinesia rating scale: Right finger tapping amplitude

Levels.01: Mild reduction in amplitude in later performance, most movements close to normal
Levels.02: Moderate, reduction in amplitude visible early in performance but continues to maintain 50% amplitude through most of the tasks
Levels.03: Severe, less than 50% amplitude through most of the task

mbrs_r_finger_rhythm.Description: Modified bradykinesia rating scale: Right finger tapping rhythm

Levels.00: Regular, no arrests or pauses in ongoing movement
Levels.01: Mild impairment, up to two brief arrests in the 10 seconds, none lasting > 1 second
Levels.02: Moderate, 3 to 4 arrests in 10 seconds; OR 1or 2 lasting > 1second
Levels.03: Severe, 5 or more arrests/10 seconds; OR more than 2 lasting > 1 second

mbrs_r_speed.Description: Modified bradykinesia rating scale: Right speed total (sum of r_speed)

mbrs_l_speed.Description: Modified bradykinesia rating scale: Left speed total (sum of l_speed)

mbrs_r_amp.Description: Modified bradykinesia rating scale: Right amplitude total (sum of r_amp)

mbrs_l_amp.Description: Modified bradykinesia rating scale: Left amplitude total (sum of l_amp)

mbrs_r_rhythm.Description: Modified bradykinesia rating scale: Right rhythm total (sum of r_rhythm)

mbrs_l_rhythm.Description: Modified bradykinesia rating scale: Left rhythm total (sum of l_rhythm)

mbrs_r_global.Description: Modified bradykinesia rating scale: Right global total (sum of r_speed + r_amp + r_rhythm)

mbrs_l_global.Description: Modified bradykinesia rating scale: Left global total (sum of l_speed + l_amp + l_rhythm)

mbrs_total.Description: Modified bradykinesia rating scale: Total score (sum of r_global + l_global)
